title: Billionaire spacewalker Jared Isaacman back before Senate seeking NASA’s top job
description: Isaacman appeared before the Commerce, Science and Transportation Committee on Wednesday, eight months after his first nomination hearing.
content: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) Billionaire spacewalker Jared Isaacman urged senators on Wednesday to take swift action on his bid to lead NASA, after being yanked and then renominated by President Donald … [+2898 chars]
